title: Boku no Sensei wa, Houkago Kawaii Konyakusha
original_name: 僕の先生は、放課後かわいい婚約者
sinopse:
Under a single roof, a teacher and a student secretly agree to live together?! Reina Sakurakouji, a beautiful woman, my teacher, and my fiancee?! And we're going to be living together in secret?! And also, Sensei is surprisingly defenseless and shy, so it's pretty cute! The story of a secret agreement to live together between teacher and student begins here!

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
